body: LEAD: The Williamsburg Bridge is not falling down. But wind, tide and pollution have taken their bite out of this 1903 marvel. title: A Bridge to the 21st Century

body: LEAD: As they try to diagnose the Williamsburg Bridge's many ills, officials are confronting a perplexing choice: spend $250 million to repair the heavily used crossing and replace its cables, a task that has never been tried while a bridge is still in service, or build an entirely new structure, which might be twice as expensive. title: A BRIDGE DILEMMA: PATCH IT OR SCRAP IT
